attributes.action: Call a General Election before September 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Britain wish to have a vote of "No Confidence" of the current Labour Government and we wish to do this by voting in a General Election to oust a Government we believe to be institutionally corrupt, full of sleaze and lies and that does not have the interest of British Citizens at its heart.  We also believe that Gordon Brown should not be in power, he is an unelected Prime minister without a mandate, and that he and many of his top officials are corrupt and misusing their position of power to undermine Britain and its people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
